history.content:
Hi everyone, 

We are Toppa @ Berkeley!

Toppa is a non-profit organization, career development, and elite mentorship program initiated by Google VP, Megan Pi, and UC Berkeley Dean of College of Engineering, Prof King Liu, aspired to unlock the full potential of the East Asian community. Toppa @ Berkeley is its first university chapter, we aim to empower students to be future leaders, and many of our alumni are currently placed on track to becoming one in the leading industries!  

If you are:

  • currently seeking professional development,

  • interested in a career in technology industries,

  • aiming to solve problems with technology,

  • self-identify as East Asian/South East Asian,

  • hope to develop soft skills and leadership,

  • eager to contribute to the community,

Or you are just interested in us in general, then come out to our Second and LAST info session to know more about us!

For our prospective members, we provide leadership training that empowers them with the soft skills and confidence needed in the industry. At the same time, we connect our members to experienced mentors and speakers in STEM and Business start-ups to accelerate their professional development via tailored mentorship and network sessions. 

We're currently accepting applications for both General Members and Project Members! We encourage you to join our journey and apply to become a Project Member to further develop your technical skills into SIX tangible semester projects led by our student project directors in a welcoming and supportive environment, where you can excel and prepare to lead others in future semesters!

Mark your calendar!

📌 Second and Last Info Session: Sun 01/31 @ 7:30pm, https://www.facebook.com/events/400440181054949/  

Application due 02/03 11:59PM: https://toppa.berkeley.edu/joinus/  

-----------------------------------------------

💡 Learn more about us on our website: https://toppa.berkeley.edu/ 
💡 Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/toppa_berkeley/  

💡 Follow our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/TOPPAatBerkeley
💡 Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/toppa-berkeley 
💡 Subscribe to our YouTube channel for exclusive training and mentorship contents: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjnX3rpQcmcI0OgDo3Tlpjw
history.subject: TOPPA @ Berkeley 2021 Spring Recruiting!!!
